Object.Field: IKM SQL to SQL Incremental Update

COMPONENT NAME: IKM SQL to SQL Incremental Update
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION: - Integrates data from any ANSI-SQL92 compliant database into any any ANSI-SQL92 compliant database target table in incremental update mode: Inexistent rows are inserted; already existing rows are updated. - Data can be controlled. Invalid data is isolated in the Error Table and can be recycled. - When using this module with a journalized source table, it is possible to synchronize deletions. - Data is moved by ODI Agent (JDBC), if flow table is on target. - Data is moved by Jython row-by-row processing, if flow table is on staging area.
BASIC CONFIGURATION - This IKM is typically used for ETL configurations: source and target tables are on different databases and the interface's staging area is set to the logical schema of the source tables or a third schema. - In case there must not be any tables be created on the target system, use these settings: FLOW_CONTROL=0, FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION=STAGING / NONE Please note that this will lead to row-by-row processing and therefore significantly lower performance.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - INSERT: Execute insert command? - UPDATE: Execute update command? - COMMIT: Commit target transaction at the end of interface? - SYNC_JRN_DELETE:Remove deleted source rows from target ? - FLOW_CONTROL: Validate incoming data by a CKM? - FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION: Flow table on target or on staging or not at all? - RECYCLE_ERRORS: Recycle rejects from previous run? - STATIC_CONTROL: Validate data once loaded into target? - TRUNCATE: truncate target before loading? - DELETE_ALL: Delete all from target before loading? - CREATE_TARG_TABLE: Create target table? - DELETE_TEMPORARY_OBJECTS: Drop ODI intermediate tables after load? - VALIDATE: Validate KM options?
RESTRICTIONS: - When working with journalized data, if the "Synchronize deletions from journal" is executed, the deleted rows on the target are committed - Deletes are commited regardless of the COMMIT option - Comparison of data is made using the Update Key defined in the interface. It has to be set. - The TRUNCATE option cannot work if the target table is referenced by another table (foreign key) - The FLOW_CONTROL and STATIC_CONTROL options call the Check Knowledge Module to isolate invalid data (if no CKM is set, an error occurs). Both options must be set to NO in the case when an Integration Interface populates a TEMPORARY target datastore.
Automatically attempts to insert data into the Target Datastore of the Interface
Identifies and updates rows of the Target Datastore depending on the value of the UPDATE_KEY columns of the target datastore records.
Commit all data inserted or updated in the target datastore.
Check this option to synchronize journalized deletions. This option will take effect only if one source table is journalized in your interface and can only be used with FLOW_CONTROL = 1.

Check this option, if you wish to perform flow control. The default value for this option is true. If this option is activated, an I$ table is created on the target or on the staging area depending on the KM option FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION.

This option allows specifying, whether and where to create the flow table. Permitted values are: STAGING, TARGET, NONE Default value: TARGET Please note that moving the flow table to staging or omitting it cannot be used with flow control and forces the IKM to work in row-by-row mode and will therefore significantly reduce performance. When FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = STAGING, the IKM will not create any objects on the target. When FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = NONE, the IKM will neither create any objects on the target nor on staging. FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = STAGING provides better performance than FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = NONE in case of journalized data sources, as FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = NONE requires to read source data twice.
Check this option to recycle data rejected from a previous control.
Check this option to control the target table after having inserted or updated target data.
Check this option if you wish to truncate the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to delete all the rows of the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to create the target table
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary objects (tables, files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging.

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - Validation of FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION - Validation of compatibility of FLOW_CONTROL option and FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is no added value in production, only processing overhead. Default: False

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %>
delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> where exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> I where <%=odiRef.getColList("", odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A") + ".[COL_NAME]\t= I.[COL_NAME]", "\n\t\tand \t", "", "(UK)")%> and IND_UPDATE = 'D' )
<% }; %>

<% if (!odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %>
import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang from time import clock as now
def transferFieldValue ( metaDataSrc, rqteSrc, srcCol, trgCol, updStmt ): colType=metaDataSrc.getColumnType(srcCol) if colType == sql.Types.VARCHAR: #Code 12 resline=rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.CHAR: #Code 1 resline=rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.INTEGER: #Code 4 resline=rqteSrc.getInt(srcCol) updStmt.setInt(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NUMERIC: #Code 2 resline=rqteSrc.getBigDecimal(srcCol) updStmt.setBigDecimal(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DECIMAL: #Code 3 resline=rqteSrc.getBigDecimal(srcCol) updStmt.setBigDecimal(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DATE: #Code 91 resline=rqteSrc.getDate(srcCol) updStmt.setDate(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TIME: #Code 92 resline=rqteSrc.getTime(srcCol) updStmt.setTime(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TIMESTAMP: #Code 93 resline=rqteSrc.getTimestamp(srcCol) updStmt.setTimestamp(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BIGINT: #Code -5 resline=rqteSrc.getLong(srcCol) updStmt.setLong(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BINARY: #Code -2 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BIT: #Code -7 resline=rqteSrc.getBoolean(srcCol) updStmt.setBoolean(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DOUBLE: #Code 8 resline=rqteSrc.getDouble(srcCol) updStmt.setDouble(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGVARBINARY: #Code -4 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGVARCHAR: #Code -1 resline= rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.OTHER: #Code 1111 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.REAL: #Code 7 resline=rqteSrc.getFloat(srcCol) updStmt.setFloat(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.SMALLINT: #Code 5 resline=rqteSrc.getShort(srcCol) updStmt.setShort(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TINYINT: #Code -6 resline=rqteSrc.getByte(srcCol) updStmt.setByte(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.VARBINARY: #Code -3 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline)
def deleteRow(): global nbDel <%=odiRef.getColList("<? c = 0; ?>", "transferFieldValue( metaDataSrc, rsSrc, <?c+=1;?><?=c?>, <?=c?>, delStmt )", "\n ", "", "(UK)")%> delStmt.addBatch() nbDel+=1 if ( nbDel % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> == 0 ): delStmt.executeBatch()
try: # Source Connection ConSrc = odiRef.getJDBCConnection( "SRC" ) fetchSize = <%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_FETCH_ARRAY")%>;
# Target (Destination) Connection ConTrg = odiRef.getJDBCConnection( "DEST" )
# Source statement + metadata readSrc = ConSrc.createStatement() <% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("STAGING")) { %> # Source query for flow table on staging sqlSrc=""" select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "(UK)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> where IND_UPDATE = 'D'""" <%} else {%> # Source query for no flow table sqlSrc=""" select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "(UK)")%> from ( <%for (int i=0; i < odiRef.getDataSetCount(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]\t[ALIAS_SEP] [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%>, <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG IND_UPDATE <%} else {%> 'I' IND_UPDATE <%}%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> ) where IND_UPDATE = 'D'<%}%>""" <%}%>
readSrc.setFetchSize( fetchSize ) rsSrc = readSrc.executeQuery(sqlSrc) metaDataSrc = rsSrc.getMetaData()
# Delete Statement rqteDelete = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t= ?", "\nand\t", "", "(UK)")%> """ delStmt = ConTrg.prepareStatement(rqteDelete)
# Set statement nb = None nbDel = 0 nbErrors = 0 delStmt.clearBatch()
# Loop over all flow records while rsSrc.next(): try: deleteRow() except Exception, ex: nbErrors+=1 raise
# Submit any remaining batched JDBC commands if ( nbDel % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> > 0 ): delStmt.executeBatch()
# Set ODI Operator row counts odiRef.setNbDelete( nbDel ) odiRef.setNbRows( nbDel )
finally: metaDataSrc = None if (('rsSrc' in locals()) and (rsSrc <> None)): rsSrc.close() rsSrc = None if (('delStmt' in locals()) and (delStmt <> None)): delStmt.close() delStmt = None
<% }; %>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%>, IND_UPDATE ) select DISTINCT <%=odiRef.getColList("", "E.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%>, 'I' IND_UPDATE from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> E where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "E.[COL_NAME]	= T.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> ) and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' and E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>'
Remove deleted rows from flow table

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %>
delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> where IND_UPDATE = 'D'
<% }; %><% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("NONE")) { %>
-- Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = NONE
<% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %>
update <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> set IND_UPDATE = 'U' where exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")+".[COL_NAME]\t= T.[COL_NAME]", "\n\t\tand\t", "", "(UK)")%> )
<% } else { %> -- Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION <> TARGET <% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %>
update <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> set IND_UPDATE = 'N' where exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")+".[COL_NAME]\t= T.[COL_NAME]", "\n\t\tand\t", "", "UK")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("and\t", "(("+odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")+".[COL_NAME] = T.[COL_NAME]) or ("+odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")+".[COL_NAME] IS NULL and T.[COL_NAME] IS NULL))", " \n\t\tand\t", "", "((UPD and !TRG) and !UK)")%> ) <% } else { %> -- Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION <> TARGET <% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %>
import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang from time import clock as now
def transferFieldValue ( metaDataSrc, rqteSrc, srcCol, trgCol, updStmt ): colType=metaDataSrc.getColumnType(srcCol) if colType == sql.Types.VARCHAR: #Code 12 resline=rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.CHAR: #Code 1 resline=rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NCHAR: #Code -15 resline=rqteSrc.getNString(srcCol) updStmt.setNString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NVARCHAR: #Code -9 resline=rqteSrc.getNString(srcCol) updStmt.setNString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NCLOB: #Code 2011 resline=rqteSrc.getNClob(srcCol) updStmt.setNClob(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.INTEGER: #Code 4 resline=rqteSrc.getInt(srcCol) updStmt.setInt(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NUMERIC: #Code 2 resline=rqteSrc.getBigDecimal(srcCol) updStmt.setBigDecimal(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DECIMAL: #Code 3 resline=rqteSrc.getBigDecimal(srcCol) updStmt.setBigDecimal(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DATE: #Code 91 resline=rqteSrc.getDate(srcCol) updStmt.setDate(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TIME: #Code 92 resline=rqteSrc.getTime(srcCol) updStmt.setTime(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TIMESTAMP: #Code 93 resline=rqteSrc.getTimestamp(srcCol) updStmt.setTimestamp(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BIGINT: #Code -5 resline=rqteSrc.getLong(srcCol) updStmt.setLong(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BINARY: #Code -2 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BIT: #Code -7 resline=rqteSrc.getBoolean(srcCol) updStmt.setBoolean(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DOUBLE: #Code 8 resline=rqteSrc.getDouble(srcCol) updStmt.setDouble(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGVARBINARY: #Code -4 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGVARCHAR: #Code -1 resline= rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.OTHER: #Code 1111 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.REAL: #Code 7 resline=rqteSrc.getFloat(srcCol) updStmt.setFloat(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.SMALLINT: #Code 5 resline=rqteSrc.getShort(srcCol) updStmt.setShort(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TINYINT: #Code -6 resline=rqteSrc.getByte(srcCol) updStmt.setByte(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.VARBINARY: #Code -3 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.ARRAY: #Code 2003 resline=rqteSrc.getArray(srcCol) updStmt.setArray(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BLOB: #Code 2004 resline=rqteSrc.getBlob(srcCol) updStmt.setBlob(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BOOLEAN: #Code 16 resline=rqteSrc.getBoolean(srcCol) updStmt.setBoolean(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.CLOB: #Code 2005 resline=rqteSrc.getClob(srcCol) updStmt.setClob(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.FLOAT: #Code 6 resline=rqteSrc.getFloat(srcCol) updStmt.setFloat(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGNVARCHAR: #Code -16 resline=rqteSrc.getBinaryStream(srcCol) updStmt.setBinaryStream(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.REF: #Code 2006 resline=rqteSrc.getRef(srcCol) updStmt.setRef(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.ROWID: #Code -8 resline=rqteSrc.getRowId(srcCol) updStmt.setRowId(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.SQLXML: #Code 2009 resline=rqteSrc.getSQLXML(srcCol) updStmt.setSQLXML(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.STRUCT: #Code 2002 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DATALINK: #Code 70 resline=rqteSrc.getURL(srcCol) updStmt.setURL(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DISTINCT: #Code 2001 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.JAVA_OBJECT: #Code 2000 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NULL: #Code 0 resline=rqteSrc.wasNull(srcCol) updStmt.setNull(trgCol,resline)
def updateRow(): global nbUpd <%=odiRef.getColList("<? c = 0; ?>", "transferFieldValue( metaDataSrc, rsSrc, dictSrc.get('''[COL_NAME]'''), <?c+=1;?><?=c?>, updStmt )", "\n ", "", "((UPD and !UK and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "transferFieldValue( metaDataSrc, rsSrc, dictSrc.get('''[COL_NAME]'''), <?c+=1;?><?=c?>, updStmt )", "\n ", "", "(UK)")%> updStmt.addBatch() nbUpd+=1 if ( nbUpd % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> == 0 ): updStmt.executeBatch()
try: # Source Connection ConSrc = odiRef.getJDBCConnection( "DEST" ) fetchSize = <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_FETCH_ARRAY")%>;
# Target (Destination) Connection ConTrg = odiRef.getJDBCConnection( "DEST" )
# Source statement + metadata readSrc = ConSrc.createStatement() sqlSrc=""" select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "((UPD and !TRG) and REW and !UK)")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "(UK)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> where IND_UPDATE = 'U'"""
readSrc.setFetchSize( fetchSize ) rsSrc = readSrc.executeQuery(sqlSrc) metaDataSrc = rsSrc.getMetaData() dictSrc = { <%=odiRef.getColList("<? c = 0; ?>", " '''[COL_NAME]'''\t:<? c+=1; ?><?=c?>", ",\n ", "", "((UPD and !TRG) and REW and !UK)")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", " '''[COL_NAME]'''\t:<? c+=1; ?><?=c?>", ",\n ", "", "(UK)")%> }
# Update Statement rqteUpdate = """ update <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> set <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t= ?", ",\n\t", "", "(((UPD and !UK) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]\t= [EXPRESSION]", ",\n\t", "", "(((UPD and !UK) and TRG) and REW)")%> where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t= ?", "\nand\t", "", "(UK)")%> """ updStmt = ConTrg.prepareStatement(rqteUpdate)
# Set statement nb = None nbUpd = 0 nbErrors = 0 updStmt.clearBatch()
# Loop over all flow records while rsSrc.next(): try: updateRow() except Exception, ex: nbErrors+=1 raise
# Submit any remaining batched JDBC commands if ( nbUpd % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> > 0 ): updStmt.executeBatch()
# Set ODI Operator row counts odiRef.setNbUpdate( nbUpd ) odiRef.setNbRows( nbUpd )
finally: metaDataSrc = None if (('rsSrc' in locals()) and (rsSrc <> None)): rsSrc.close() rsSrc = None if (('readSrc' in locals()) and (readSrc <> None)): readSrc.close() readSrc = None if (('updStmt' in locals()) and (updStmt <> None)): updStmt.close() updStmt = None
<% } else { %> # Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION <> TARGET <% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %>
insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	","", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(odiRef.getColList(",", " ", "", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)"), "[COL_NAME]", ",
	","", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> ) select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(odiRef.getColList(",", " ", "", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)"), "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> where IND_UPDATE = 'I'
<% } else { %> -- Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION <> TARGET <% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("NONE")) { %>
# Define Query on Source sqlSrc = """ <%for (int i=0; i < odiRef.getDataSetCount(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]\t[ALIAS_SEP] [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", ",", "(!TRG and REW and UK)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]\t[ALIAS_SEP] [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", ",", "(!TRG and REW and !UK)")%> <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG IND_UPDATE <%} else {%> 'I' IND_UPDATE <%}%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> and JRN_FLAG <> 'D' <%}%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%> """
<%} else {%> # Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION <> NONE <%};%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %> create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] "+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"),",\n\t", "", "")%>, IND_UPDATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR","1")%> ) <% }; %><% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("NONE")) { %> -- Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = NONE <% }; %>

<? flowTableName = odiRef.getObjectName( "L", <%=odiRef.getQuotedString( odiRef.getTableName("INT_SHORT_NAME")) %>, "W"); ?> <% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("STAGING")) { %> create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[SOURCE_WRI_DT] "+ odiRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL"),",\n\t", "", "")%>, IND_UPDATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","1")%> ) <% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("STAGING") || odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("NONE") ) { %>
import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang from time import clock as now
def transferFieldValue ( metaDataSrc, rqteSrc, srcCol, trgCol, updStmt ): colType=metaDataSrc.getColumnType(srcCol) print colType if colType == sql.Types.VARCHAR: #Code 12 resline=rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.CHAR: #Code 1 resline=rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NCHAR: #Code -15 resline=rqteSrc.getNString(srcCol) updStmt.setNString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NVARCHAR: #Code -9 resline=rqteSrc.getNString(srcCol) updStmt.setNString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NCLOB: #Code 2011 resline=rqteSrc.getNClob(srcCol) updStmt.setNClob(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.INTEGER: #Code 4 resline=rqteSrc.getInt(srcCol) updStmt.setInt(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NUMERIC: #Code 2 resline=rqteSrc.getBigDecimal(srcCol) updStmt.setBigDecimal(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DECIMAL: #Code 3 resline=rqteSrc.getBigDecimal(srcCol) updStmt.setBigDecimal(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DATE: #Code 91 resline=rqteSrc.getDate(srcCol) updStmt.setDate(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TIME: #Code 92 resline=rqteSrc.getTime(srcCol) updStmt.setTime(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TIMESTAMP: #Code 93 resline=rqteSrc.getTimestamp(srcCol) updStmt.setTimestamp(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BIGINT: #Code -5 resline=rqteSrc.getLong(srcCol) updStmt.setLong(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BINARY: #Code -2 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BIT: #Code -7 resline=rqteSrc.getBoolean(srcCol) updStmt.setBoolean(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DOUBLE: #Code 8 resline=rqteSrc.getDouble(srcCol) updStmt.setDouble(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGVARBINARY: #Code -4 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGVARCHAR: #Code -1 resline= rqteSrc.getString(srcCol) updStmt.setString(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.OTHER: #Code 1111 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.REAL: #Code 7 resline=rqteSrc.getFloat(srcCol) updStmt.setFloat(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.SMALLINT: #Code 5 resline=rqteSrc.getShort(srcCol) updStmt.setShort(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.TINYINT: #Code -6 resline=rqteSrc.getByte(srcCol) updStmt.setByte(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.VARBINARY: #Code -3 resline=rqteSrc.getBytes(srcCol) updStmt.setBytes(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.ARRAY: #Code 2003 resline=rqteSrc.getArray(srcCol) updStmt.setArray(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BLOB: #Code 2004 resline=rqteSrc.getBlob(srcCol) updStmt.setBlob(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.BOOLEAN: #Code 16 resline=rqteSrc.getBoolean(srcCol) updStmt.setBoolean(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.CLOB: #Code 2005 resline=rqteSrc.getClob(srcCol) updStmt.setClob(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.FLOAT: #Code 6 resline=rqteSrc.getFloat(srcCol) updStmt.setFloat(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.LONGNVARCHAR: #Code -16 resline=rqteSrc.getBinaryStream(srcCol) updStmt.setBinaryStream(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.REF: #Code 2006 resline=rqteSrc.getRef(srcCol) updStmt.setRef(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.ROWID: #Code -8 resline=rqteSrc.getRowId(srcCol) updStmt.setRowId(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.SQLXML: #Code 2009 resline=rqteSrc.getSQLXML(srcCol) updStmt.setSQLXML(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.STRUCT: #Code 2002 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DATALINK: #Code 70 resline=rqteSrc.getURL(srcCol) updStmt.setURL(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.DISTINCT: #Code 2001 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.JAVA_OBJECT: #Code 2000 resline=rqteSrc.getObject(srcCol) updStmt.setObject(trgCol,resline) elif colType == sql.Types.NULL: #Code 0 resline=rqteSrc.wasNull(srcCol) updStmt.setNull(trgCol,resline)
def keyAlreadyExists(): <%=odiRef.getColList("<? c = 0; ?>", "# Set value for [COL_NAME]\n transferFieldValue( metaDataSrc, rsSrc, dictSrc.get('''[COL_NAME]'''), <?c+=1;?><?=c?>, lookupStmt )", "\n ", "", "(UK)")%> rs = lookupStmt.executeQuery() return rs.next()
def insertRow(): global nbIns <%=odiRef.getColList("<? c = 0; ?>", "transferFieldValue( metaDataSrc, rsSrc, dictSrc.get('''[COL_NAME]'''), <?c+=1;?><?=c?>, insStmt )", "\n ", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> insStmt.addBatch() nbIns+=1 if ( nbIns % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> == 0 ): insStmt.executeBatch()
def updateRow(): global nbUpd <%=odiRef.getColList("<? c = 0; ?>", "transferFieldValue( metaDataSrc, rsSrc, dictSrc.get('''[COL_NAME]'''), <?c+=1;?><?=c?>, updStmt )", "\n ", "", "((UPD and !UK and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "transferFieldValue( metaDataSrc, rsSrc, dictSrc.get('''[COL_NAME]'''), <?c+=1;?><?=c?>, updStmt )", "\n ", "", "(UK)")%> updStmt.addBatch() nbUpd+=1 if ( nbUpd % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> == 0 ): updStmt.executeBatch()
try: # Source Connection ConSrc = odiRef.getJDBCConnection( "SRC" )
# Target (Destination) Connection ConTrg = odiRef.getJDBCConnection( "DEST" )
# Source statement + metadata <% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("STAGING")) { %> sqlSrc=""" select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "(!TRG and REW and UK)")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "(!TRG and REW and !UK)")%> from <?=flowTableName?> """
<% } else {%> # Query sqlSrc is defined on Source tab <% }%> readSrc = ConSrc.createStatement() readSrc.setFetchSize( <%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_FETCH_ARRAY")%> ) rsSrc = readSrc.executeQuery(sqlSrc) metaDataSrc = rsSrc.getMetaData() dictSrc = { <%=odiRef.getColList("<? c = 0; ?>", " '''[COL_NAME]'''\t:<? c+=1; ?><?=c?>", ",\n ", " , ", "(UK)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", " '''[COL_NAME]'''\t:<? c+=1; ?><?=c?>", ",\n ", "", "(!TRG and REW and !UK)")%> }
# Lookup Statement sqlLookup = """ select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> where ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME] = ?", " AND\n\t\t", "", "(UK)")%> ) """ lookupStmt = ConTrg.prepareStatement( sqlLookup )
# Insert Statement sqlInsert = """ insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> ) values ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "?", ",\n\t\t", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[EXPRESSION]", ",\n\t\t", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> ) """ insStmt = ConTrg.prepareStatement( sqlInsert )
# Update Statement sqlUpdate = """ update <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> set <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t= ?", ",\n\t\t", "", "(((UPD and !UK) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]\t= [EXPRESSION]", ",\n\t\t", "", "(((UPD and !UK) and TRG) and REW)")%> where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t= ?", "\nand\t\t", "", "(UK)")%> """ updStmt = ConTrg.prepareStatement( sqlUpdate )
# Set statement nbIns = 0 nbUpd = 0 nbErrors = 0 insStmt.clearBatch() updStmt.clearBatch()
# Loop over all flow records while rsSrc.next():
try: # Does the record already exist in target? if keyAlreadyExists(): <% if (odiRef.getOption("UPDATE").equals("1")) { %> updateRow() <%}%> else: <% if (odiRef.getOption("INSERT").equals("1")) { %> insertRow() <%}%> except Exception, ex: nbErrors+=1 raise
# Submit any remaining batched JDBC commands if ( nbIns % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> > 0 ): insStmt.executeBatch() if ( nbUpd % <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_BATCH_UPDATE")%> > 0 ): updStmt.executeBatch()
# Set ODI Operator row counts odiRef.setNbInsert( nbIns ) odiRef.setNbUpdate( nbUpd ) odiRef.setNbRows( nbIns + nbUpd )
finally: metaDataSrc = None dictSrc = None if (('rsSrc' in locals()) and (rsSrc <> None)): rsSrc.close() rsSrc = None if (('readSrc' in locals()) and (readSrc <> None)): readSrc.close() readSrc = None if (('lookupStmt' in locals()) and (lookupStmt <> None)): lookupStmt.close() lookupStmt = None if (('insStmt' in locals()) and (insStmt <> None)): insStmt.close() insStmt = None if (('updStmt' in locals()) and (updStmt <> None)): updStmt.close() updStmt = None
<% } else { %> # Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = STAGING <% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("TARGET")) { %> insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%>, IND_UPDATE ) values ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", ":[CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "","(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%>, :IND_UPDATE ) <% }; %><% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("NONE")) { %> -- Skipped due to FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION = NONE <% }; %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("STAGING")) { %> insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%>, IND_UPDATE ) <% } %>
<% if (!odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_LOCATION").equals("NONE")) { %> <%for (int i=0; i < odiRef.getDataSetCount(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]\t[ALIAS_SEP] [CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "(((INS or UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%>, <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG IND_UPDATE <%} else {%> 'I' IND_UPDATE <%}%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%>
<%}%>
<% } %>
